alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:26PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jefferson County through 300 PM CDT... At 226 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Purdy, or near Mountain Brook, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Birmingham, Vestavia Hills, Mountain Brook, Irondale, Cahaba Heights, Alton, Barber Motorsports Park, The Summit, Lake Purdy, Brook Highland, Grants Mill Road Bridge, Birmingham Race Course, Ruffner Mountain and Liberty Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
